about.title: About TrueScale
about.subtitle: Precision. Passion. Perfection in 1:64 scale.
about.whoDescription: TrueScale is more than just a shop. We are a passionate community of scale car model collectors who appreciate the details, design, and heritage behind every miniature vehicle. Our journey began with a deep love for motorsports and precision modeling. Since our foundation, we've served thousands of collectors who seek quality, authenticity, and beauty in every piece.
about.missionText: To deliver premium 1:64 scale models to collectors around the world and inspire appreciation for automotive design.
about.visionText: To become the #1 destination for authentic die-cast models and a hub for passionate collectors worldwide.
about.valuesText: Quality, community, attention to detail, respect for automotive culture, and integrity in every interaction.
